CustomField.description: Created this field to check if the QLI is an Amendment item.
CustomField.formula: OR( AND( ISBLANK(Renewal_OLI_ID__c), ISBLANK(Upsell_OLI_ID__c), For_Renewal__c = TRUE /*New products added from Pricebook*/ ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Renewal_OLI_ID__c)), ISBLANK(Upsell_OLI_ID__c), For_Renewal__c = TRUE, Quantity <> Renewal_OLI_ID__r.Quantity /*Product quantity increased/decreased on Quote line items*/ ), AND( ISBLANK(Renewal_OLI_ID__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Upsell_OLI_ID__c)), For_Renewal__c = TRUE /*New product added to upsell got merged to the Quote*/ ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Renewal_OLI_ID__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Upsell_OLI_ID__c)), /*Renewal Product quantity increased/decreased on Quote through as upsell*/ For_Renewal__c = TRUE, Quantity <> Renewal_OLI_ID__r.Quantity ))
CustomField.label: Conga Amendment Check
